== Kubuntu 16.04 to 16.10 Upgrade ==

If your using a Laptop ensure the following things are done.

You will need to:
* Ensure your laptop is connected to power.
* If at all practical, ensure that you are connected to the Internet via a wired connection.
* Ensure 16.04 is updated.
* Switch the release upgrade mode from LTS to Normal.
* Run the release upgrade tool.
* Reboot.

For Desktops:

You will need to:
* Ensure 16.04 is updated.
* Switch the release upgrade mode from LTS to Normal.
* Run the release upgrade tool.
* Reboot.

=== Ensure your laptop is connected to power ===

The upgrade should run uninterrupted.

=== If at all practical, ensure that you are connected to the Internet via a wired connection ===

The upgrade may change your wireless networking applications and drivers.

=== Ensure 16.04 is updated ===

==== Run Plasma Discover ====

Use <alt> <F2> to bring up krunner, and type plasma-discover and select Discover

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot1.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Select Install Updates ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot2.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Supply your sudo password ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot4.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Wait for updates to install ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot5.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Re-boot if suggested ====

----

=== Run Plasma Discover Again ===

==== Open the 'Configure Software Sources' menu item. ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot5a.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Change the Release Upgrade mode to 'Normal Releases'. ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot5b.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Restart Discover and it will notify you of an upgrade. ====

Click "Upgrade".

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot6.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Supply your sudo password ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot7.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== The Release Upgrade tool will be downloaded and started ====

16.10 introductory notes will be shown

Select Upgrade.

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot8.png]]</nowiki>

'''Note: If the upgrade notes do not appear, you may be affected by <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/plasma-discover/+bug/1633692|Bug 1633692]]</nowiki>'''

This can be fixed by installing the package '''ubuntu-release-upgrader-qt''' via Discover/Muon or another package manager. 

Or alternatively by installing in Konsole or other terminal application with ''''sudo apt install ubuntu-release-upgrader-qt''''.

----

==== Allow the upgrade to start ====

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot10.png]]</nowiki>

Then Start Upgrade; it will download and install 16.10.

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot9.png]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot11.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Wait (approximately an hour) ====

Enjoy a cup of coffee.

----

==== Remove obsolete packages ====

Click '''Remove'''. 

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot12.png]]</nowiki>

----

=== Restart your computer ===

It will ask you to restart your computer. Ensure you have no unsaved work open and click Restart Now.

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot13.png]]</nowiki>

----

== Welcome to Kubuntu 16.10 ==

Your computer should boot into Kubuntu 16.10, with the new Plasma 5.7.5 desktop

<nowiki>[[File:snapshot14.png]]</nowiki>
